lms_rozier_convers.core.card

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • lms_rozier_convers.core.card.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FrequentMCard, GoldenMCard, StandardMCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    The class card always has a mamber attribute, and represents its membership. It it used in a strategy pattern to determine how the linked member borrows items.

    • Field Detail

      • fineAmount

        protected double fineAmount
        These parameters are used by the PenaltyCalculator to calculate the penalty according to the member type. It is a implementation of a visitor pattern.
        See Also:
        PenaltyCalculator

        protected Duration suspensionDuration

      • borrow

        public void borrow(LibraryItem item)
        Method called whenever a member wants to borrow an item.
        Parameters:
        item -

      • giveBack

        public void giveBack(LibraryItem item)
              throws ObjectNotFoundException
        This method is called to giveback an item. It also checks if the member should have a penalty, send a message to first member who has reserved and fit the item with the fit strategy of the library.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Throws:
        ObjectNotFoundException
